metadata.name: Potential PrintNightmare Exploitation Attempt
metadata.comment: Detect DLL deletions from Spooler Service driver folder. This might be a potential exploitation attempt of CVE-2021-1675

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 4 AND endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\spoolsv.exe')) AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\spool\\\\drivers\\\\x64\\\\3\\\\')))

output.summary: Detect DLL deletions from Spooler Service driver folder. This might be a potential exploitation attempt of CVE-2021-1675
